name: CheckList Run
description:
Button mashing game made for WGJ161

Land 3 Planes to finish a level.  Match the command to the proper plane that made the request.

Wanted to make a simple mechanic so i can emphasize on game design and polish. Total Fail, spent the entire time on game mechanics and the last day on progression design and some polish. Had to switch from endless with points to a simple 3 planes per level. had to scrap making menu and high score board. Also ran of time before working on the slide. and the repair system. oh well

future Level progression ideas:panels will break and need repairing by fast clicking, and word swaping like 3 means 2 up is down and so on.  an endless version with points and high score would of been better.

Music By: bensound.com

Some ui: kenney.nl
